name: Pac-Man Tamagotchi
summary: Pac-Man Tamagotchi is a handheld LCD game, released by Bandai Namco Entertainment in 2020 for Pac-Man’s 40th anniversary. The game is a “Tamagotchi,” with the player taking care of a virtual pet; Pac-Man helps the pets by scaring away Ghosts. Two Pac-Man-themed minigames are also included.
